div.p: From the Sociedad Mexicana de Geografia y Estadistica
RB MSS M200b.51, Library, Royal Botanic Gardens, Melbourne.

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt; text-align: center;
font-family: Geneva, Geneva; margin-left: 0.3335in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: -0.3335in; font-size: 9pt;

note.p: MS is a black and white certificate with an illustrated border and bearing the crest and seal of the Society.

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt; text-align: center;
font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt; text-align: center;
font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt;

div.p:
La Sociedad Mexicana de Geografia y Estadística
nombra en clase de Socio
Corresponsal al Sr. Dr. Baron Fernando Von Mueller; y para la debida constancia le expide el presente diploma.

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt; text-align: center;

div.p: The Mexican Society of Geography and Statistics nominates for the class of corresponding member Dr. Baron Ferdinand Von Mueller; and as due acknowledgement the following diploma is sent to him.

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; margin-left: 1.75in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in; font-size: 10pt;
